descriptionHtml:

Sorry,I am not good at English.
I am using a translation site. 



[b][size=5][u][color=#cfe2f3]About this mod

[/color][/u][/size][/b][size=3][color=#c9daf8]・This mod add [/color][color=#ff0000]"Haduki"[/color][color=#c9daf8] follower.[/color]
[/size][color=#c9daf8][size=3]・Follower is STANDALONE which means no other mods will be required.[/size][/color][size=3][color=#c9daf8]
・Combat style: 「Destruction Magic」 And 「Melee Weapons」.
[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#c9daf8]・She can be found in [/color][color=#ffff00]Dead Man's Drink.[/color][color=#c9daf8]
[/color][/size]




[color=#c9daf8][size=5][b][u]Recommend Mods
[/u][/b][/size][/color][size=3]
ENB
Follower overhaul mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk[/size][color=#c9daf8][size=3]
[/size][/color]



[size=4][u][color=#fff2cc]Installation.[/color]
[/u][/size][color=#fce5cd]・Manually install is not recommended. I recommended that you use the NMM or Mod Organizer.
[/color]

[b][color=#fce5cd][size=4][u]Change Log
[/u][/size][/color][/b]
[color=#fce5cd]v1.0 [/color]
[color=#fce5cd][size=3]・Haduki of Stand Alone follower will be added.
[/size][/color]
